snippet: After winning re-election last month, Representative Jo Ann Emerson, the Republican dean of Missouri's Congressional delegation, has decided to leave Congress to head up a utilities lobbying firm.
abstract: After winning re-election last month, Representative Jo Ann Emerson, the Republican dean of Missouri's Congressional delegation, has decided to leave Congress to head up a utilities lobbying firm.

headline.main: After Re-election, Missouri Republican Decides to Leave Congress
